00021 CDialog::CDialog(Uint16 w, Uint16 h, char inputmode, Uint8 theme) :
00022 m_Font_ID((theme==DLG_THEME_GALAXY) ? 1 : 0)
00023 {
00024  m_int=0;
00025  m_min=0;
00026  m_max=0;
00027 
00028  m_theme = theme;
00029  
00030  m_x = (300/2)-(w*4)+10;
00031  m_y = (200/2)-(h*4);
00032  m_w = w; m_h = h;
00033  if(m_theme==DLG_THEME_GALAXY)
00034  {
00035   m_y -= 5;
00036   if(m_x < 58)
00037    m_x = 58;
00038   if(m_y < 58)
00039    m_y = 58;
00040   if(m_w > 100)
00041    m_w = 100;
00042   if(m_h > 50)
00043    m_h = 50;
00044  }
00045  else
00046  {
00047   if(m_x + m_w > 320)
00048    m_w = 320-m_x;
00049   if(m_y + m_h > 200)
00050    m_h = 200-m_y;
00051  }
00052  
00053  m_twirl.posy = m_y;
00054  m_twirl.frame = 0;
00055  m_twirl.timer = 0;
00056  
00057  setInputMode(inputmode);
00058  m_blink = true;
00059  m_blinkctr = 0;
00060  m_selected_ID = 0;
00061  m_length = 15;
00062  m_switch = 0;
00063  m_scroll = 0;
00064  mp_Frame = new CDlgFrame(m_x, m_y, m_w, m_h, theme);
00065  m_alpha = 128;
00066 }
00067

00071 /**
00072  * \brief setter for the actual selected item in the dialog object

00075 void CDialog::setSelection( const Uint8 selection)
00076 { m_selected_ID = selection; }

00082 void CDialog::setInputMode( const char inputmode )

00085 void CDialog::addObject(Uint8 type, Uint16 x, Uint16 y,const std::string text)
00086 {
00087  CDlgObject *DlgObject = new CDlgObject();
00088  DlgObject->create( type, m_dlgobject.size(),
00089        m_x+(x*8), m_y+(y*8),
00090        text, m_w-((x-m_x)/8)-5,
00091        m_Font_ID, m_theme);
00092  m_dlgobject.push_back(DlgObject);
00093  
00094  // Check if the ID is not out of bounds.
00095  if( m_selected_ID < m_dlgobject.size() ) return;
00096  
00097  for(Uint8 i=0 ; i<m_dlgobject.size() ; i++) // go the next selectable item
00098  {
00099   if(!m_dlgobject.at(m_selected_ID)->m_selectable)
00100   {
00101    m_selected_ID++;
00102   }
00103  }
00104 }
00105 
00106 void CDialog::setObjectText(Uint8 ID, const std::string &text)
00107 {
00108  Uint8 type = m_dlgobject[ID]->m_type;
00109  m_dlgobject[ID]->change( m_w-((m_dlgobject[ID]->m_x-m_x)/8)-4, text, type );
00110 }
00111 
00112 void CDialog::setObjectType(Uint8 ID, Uint8 type)
00113 {
00114  std::string text = m_dlgobject[ID]->m_Option->m_text;
00115  m_dlgobject[ID]->change( m_w-((m_dlgobject[ID]->m_x-m_x)/8)-4, text, type );
00116 }

00118 void CDialog::setFontID(Uint8 value)
00119 { m_Font_ID = value; }

00121 bool CDialog::getInputMode( const char inputmode )
00122 { return (m_inputmode==inputmode); }

00124 int CDialog::getSelection()
00125 { return m_selected_ID; }

00127 ///
00128 // Process routine
00129 ///
00130 /**
00131  * \brief   This one processes the input of the dialogs. Depending on what type of dialog
00132  *      and controls we have, the input mode is set. For example, if the dialog has sliders,
00133  *      you might set input mode to INPUT_MODE_SLIDER
00134  * \param move This can be used to set the selection of the item when the dialog is loaded
00135  */
00136 void CDialog::processInput(int move)
00137 {
00138  // INPUT_MODE_NOTHING   == do nothing
00139  // INPUT_MODE_TEXT    == text input
00140  // INPUT_MODE_INTEGER  == integer input
00141  // INPUT_MODE_UP_DOWN  == up/down movement, enter selection
00142  // INPUT_MODE_LEFT_RIGHT == left/right movement, enter selection
00143  // INPUT_MODE_SLIDER  == slider, up/down movement
00144  // INPUT_MODE_OPTION  == option, left/right selection, up/down movement
00145  // INPUT_MODE_COUNTER  == counter, up/down movment
00146  
00147  if( m_inputmode == INPUT_MODE_TEXT )
00148  {
00149   // Get the input
00150   if(g_pInput->getPressedIsTypingKey() && (m_name.length() < m_length))
00151   {
00152    m_name.append(g_pInput->getPressedTypingKey());
00153   }
00154   
00155   if(g_pInput->getPulsedKey(KBCKSPCE, 5) && (m_name.length() > 0))
00156   {
00157    m_name.erase(m_name.length()-1);
00158   }
00159   
00160   if( m_blinkctr >= 30 )
00161   {
00162    m_blink = !m_blink;
00163    m_blinkctr = 0;
00164   }
00165   else m_blinkctr++;
00166   
00167   if(m_blink)
00168    setObjectText(m_selected_ID, m_name + "|");
00169   else if(m_name == "")
00170    setObjectText(m_selected_ID, "|");
00171   else
00172    setObjectText(m_selected_ID, m_name);
00173  }
00174  else if( m_inputmode == INPUT_MODE_INTEGER )
00175  {
00176   // Get the num input
00177   if(g_pInput->getPressedIsNumKey() && (m_name.length() < m_length))
00178   {
00179    m_name.append(g_pInput->getPressedNumKey());
00180   }
00181   
00182   if(g_pInput->getPulsedKey(KBCKSPCE, 5) && (m_name.length() > 0))
00183   {
00184    m_name.erase(m_name.length()-1);
00185   }
00186   
00187   if( m_blinkctr >= 30 )
00188   {
00189    m_blink = !m_blink;
00190    m_blinkctr = 0;
00191   }
00192   else m_blinkctr++;
00193   
00194   if(m_blink)
00195    setObjectText(m_selected_ID, m_name + "|");
00196   else if(m_name == "")
00197    setObjectText(m_selected_ID, "|");
00198   else
00199    setObjectText(m_selected_ID, m_name);
00200  }
00201  else if(m_inputmode != INPUT_MODE_NOTHING)
00202  {
00203   if(move != 0)
00204    m_selected_ID += move;
00205   do
00206   {
00207    if(!m_dlgobject.at(m_selected_ID)->m_selectable)
00208    {
00209     m_selected_ID++;
00210     m_name = m_dlgobject.at(m_selected_ID)->m_Option->m_text;
00211    }
00212   }while(!m_dlgobject.at(m_selected_ID)->m_selectable);
00213   
00214   
00215   bool prev_sel = (m_inputmode == INPUT_MODE_UP_DOWN or
00216        m_inputmode == INPUT_MODE_COUNTER or
00217        m_inputmode == INPUT_MODE_SLIDER or
00218        m_inputmode == INPUT_MODE_OPTION);
00219   
00220   bool next_sel = prev_sel;
00221   
00222   if(g_pInput->getPulsedCommand(next_sel ? IC_DOWN : IC_RIGHT, 60))
00223   {
00224    do
00225    {
00226     if(m_selected_ID >= m_dlgobject.size()-1)
00227     {
00228      m_switch=1;
00229      m_scroll=0;
00230      m_selected_ID = 0;
00231      m_name = m_dlgobject.at(m_selected_ID)->m_Option->m_text;
00232     }
00233     else
00234     {
00235      m_selected_ID++;
00236      m_name = m_dlgobject.at(m_selected_ID)->m_Option->m_text;
00237      
00238      if(m_selected_ID >= m_h-2+m_scroll)
00239      {
00240       m_scroll++;
00241      }
00242      
00243      if(!m_dlgobject.at(m_selected_ID)->m_selectable)
00244      {
00245       if(m_selected_ID+1 <= m_dlgobject.size()-1)
00246        m_selected_ID++;
00247       else
00248        m_selected_ID = 0;
00249       m_name = m_dlgobject.at(m_selected_ID)->m_Option->m_text;
00250      }
00251     }
00252     
00253    }while(!m_dlgobject.at(m_selected_ID)->m_selectable);
00254   }
00255   else if(g_pInput->getPulsedCommand( prev_sel ? IC_UP : IC_LEFT, 60))
00256   {
00257    do
00258    {
00259     if(m_selected_ID <= 0 )
00260     {
00261      m_switch=2;
00262      
00263      if(m_dlgobject.size() > m_h-2)
00264       m_scroll = m_dlgobject.size()-m_h+2;
00265      m_selected_ID = m_dlgobject.size()-1;
00266      m_name = m_dlgobject.at(m_selected_ID)->m_Option->m_text;
00267     }
00268     else
00269     {
00270      m_selected_ID--;
00271      m_name = m_dlgobject.at(m_selected_ID)->m_Option->m_text;
00272      
00273      if(m_selected_ID < m_scroll)
00274       m_scroll--;
00275      
00276      if(!m_dlgobject.at(m_selected_ID)->m_selectable)
00277      {
00278       if(m_selected_ID-1 >= 0)
00279        m_selected_ID--;
00280       else
00281        m_selected_ID = m_dlgobject.size()-1;
00282       m_name = m_dlgobject.at(m_selected_ID)->m_Option->m_text;
00283      }
00284     }
00285    }while(!m_dlgobject.at(m_selected_ID)->m_selectable);
00286   }
00287   if(m_inputmode == INPUT_MODE_SLIDER or m_inputmode == INPUT_MODE_COUNTER)
00288   {
00289    //slider and counter
00290    if(m_inputmode == INPUT_MODE_COUNTER)
00291    {
00292     m_int = atoi(m_name);
00293     m_noise = false;
00294    }
00295    if(m_inputmode == INPUT_MODE_SLIDER)
00296    {
00297     m_int = m_dlgobject.at(m_selected_ID)->m_Option->m_value;
00298     m_min = 0;
00299     m_max = 16;
00300    }
00301    
00302    if(g_pInput->getPulsedCommand(IC_RIGHT, 35))
00303    {
00304     if(m_int<m_max)
00305     {
00306      m_int++;
00307      if(m_noise)
00308       g_pSound->playSound(SOUND_GUN_CLICK, PLAY_FORCE);
00309     }
00310     else
00311      m_int = m_max;
00312    }
00313    else if(g_pInput->getPulsedCommand(IC_LEFT, 35))
00314    {
00315     if(m_int>m_min)
00316     {
00317      m_int--;
00318      if(m_noise)
00319       g_pSound->playSound(SOUND_GUN_CLICK, PLAY_FORCE);
00320     }
00321     else
00322      m_int = m_min;
00323    }
00324    
00325    if(m_inputmode == INPUT_MODE_COUNTER)
00326    {
00327     m_name = itoa(m_int);
00328     setObjectText(m_selected_ID, " "+m_name);
00329    }
00330    else if(m_inputmode == INPUT_MODE_SLIDER)
00331    {
00332     m_dlgobject.at(m_selected_ID)->m_Option->m_value = m_int;
00333     m_dlgobject.at(m_selected_ID)->m_Option->m_FontMapID = 1;
00334     
00335     std::string asciislider;
00336     
00337     asciislider += 1;
00338     
00339     // Why does it go from 0 to 16. If we have a resolution of 16 steps
00340     // It might have to go from 0 to 15
00341     for(Uint16 i=0 ; i<m_int ; i++)
00342      asciislider += 4;
00343     asciislider += 5;
00344     for(Uint16 i=m_int+1 ; i<=16 ; i++)
00345      asciislider += 6;
00346     asciislider += 7;
00347     
00348     setObjectText(m_selected_ID, asciislider);
00349    }
00350   }
00351   if(m_inputmode == INPUT_MODE_OPTION)
00352   {
00353    //This one is basically the counter for non number entries.  It allows for easier scrolling through lists back and forth ie resolutions.
00354     m_int = m_dlgobject.at(m_selected_ID)->m_Option->m_value;
00355    
00356    if(g_pInput->getPressedCommand(IC_RIGHT))
00357    {
00358      if (m_int<m_max)
00359      m_int++;
00360    }
00361    else if(g_pInput->getPressedCommand(IC_LEFT))
00362    {
00363      if (m_int>m_min)
00364      m_int--;
00365    }
00366    
00367     m_dlgobject.at(m_selected_ID)->m_Option->m_value = m_int;
00368   }
00369  }
00370 }
00371 
00372 void CDialog::draw()
00373 {
00374  SDL_Surface *dst_sfc = g_pVideoDriver->FGLayerSurface;
00375  
00376  if(m_alpha < 230)
00377  {
00378   SDL_SetAlpha(dst_sfc, SDL_SRCALPHA, m_alpha );
00379   m_alpha+=20;
00380  }
00381  
00382  // Render the empty Dialog frame if any
00383  if(mp_Frame) mp_Frame->draw(dst_sfc);
00384  
00385  CFont &Font = g_pGfxEngine->getFont(m_Font_ID);
00386  // Draw the to icon up or down accordingly
00387  if( m_scroll>0 ) // Up Arrow
00388  {
00389   Font.drawCharacter(dst_sfc, 15,
00390          mp_Frame->m_x+mp_Frame->m_w-16,
00391          mp_Frame->m_y+8);
00392  }
00393  if( ( m_h-2 < (Uint8) m_dlgobject.size() )  &&
00394     ( m_scroll+m_h-2 != m_dlgobject.size() )) // Down Arrow
00395  {
00396   Font.drawCharacter(dst_sfc , 19,
00397          mp_Frame->m_x+mp_Frame->m_w-16,
00398          mp_Frame->m_y+mp_Frame->m_h-16);
00399  }
00400  
00401  Uint8 max;
00402  if( m_h+m_scroll-2 > (Uint8)m_dlgobject.size() )
00403   max = m_dlgobject.size();
00404  else
00405   max = m_h+m_scroll-2;
00406  
00407  // they are processed by ID of course
00408  for(Uint16 i=m_scroll ; i<max ; i++)
00409  {
00410   m_dlgobject[i]->setSelection( i==m_selected_ID ? true : false);
00411   m_dlgobject[i]->render(dst_sfc, m_scroll, false );
00412  }
00413  Font.setFGColour(dst_sfc->format, 0x0); // Set black letter color for the other elements
00414  
00415  if(m_inputmode == INPUT_MODE_COUNTER)
00416  {
00417   if(m_int>m_min)
00418    Font.drawCharacter(dst_sfc, 21,
00419           m_dlgobject[m_selected_ID]->m_x+16,
00420           m_dlgobject[m_selected_ID]->m_y);
00421   if(m_int<m_max)
00422    Font.drawCharacter(dst_sfc, 17,
00423           m_dlgobject[m_selected_ID]->m_x+16+m_dlgobject[m_selected_ID]->m_Option->m_text.length()*8,
00424           m_dlgobject[m_selected_ID]->m_y);
00425  }
00426  
00427  // Render the twirl
00428  if(m_theme != DLG_THEME_GALAXY)
00429   drawTwirl();
00430 }
00431 
00432 #define TWIRL_TIME 5
00433 void CDialog::drawTwirl()
00434 {
00435  if( m_twirl.timer >= TWIRL_TIME )
00436  {
00437   m_twirl.timer = 0;
00438   
00439   if(m_twirl.frame >= 7)
00440    m_twirl.frame=0;
00441   else
00442    m_twirl.frame++;
00443  }
00444  else m_twirl.timer++;
00445  
00446  if(m_dlgobject[m_selected_ID]->m_y-8*m_scroll < m_twirl.posy or m_switch == 1)
00447  {
00448   if(m_switch == 1)
00449   {
00450    m_switch = 0;
00451    
00452    m_twirl.posy = m_dlgobject[m_selected_ID]->m_y-8*m_scroll;
00453   }
00454   else if(m_twirl.posy-m_dlgobject[m_selected_ID]->m_y > 8)
00455   {
00456    m_twirl.posy = m_twirl.posy-2;
00457   }
00458   else
00459    m_twirl.posy--;
00460   
00461  }
00462  else if(m_dlgobject[m_selected_ID]->m_y-8*m_scroll > m_twirl.posy or m_switch == 2)
00463  {
00464   if(m_switch == 2)
00465   {
00466    m_switch = 0;
00467    m_twirl.posy = m_dlgobject[m_selected_ID]->m_y-8*m_scroll;
00468   }
00469   else if(m_dlgobject[m_selected_ID]->m_y-m_twirl.posy > 8)
00470   {
00471    m_twirl.posy = m_twirl.posy+2;
00472   }
00473   else
00474    m_twirl.posy++;
00475   
00476  }
00477  
00478  g_pGfxEngine->getCursor()->draw( g_pVideoDriver->FGLayerSurface, m_twirl.frame,
00479          m_dlgobject[m_selected_ID]->m_x,
00480          m_twirl.posy );
00481 }
00482 
00483 ///
00484 // Destruction Routines
00485 ///
00486 CDialog::~CDialog(){
00487  
00488  for(Uint8 i=0 ; i<m_dlgobject.size() ; i++ )
00489   delete m_dlgobject[i]; // the first vector element must be cleared
00490  
00491  while(!m_dlgobject.empty())
00492   m_dlgobject.pop_back();
00493  
00494  m_alpha = 225;
00495  SDL_SetAlpha(g_pVideoDriver->FGLayerSurface, SDL_SRCALPHA, m_alpha );
00496  
00497  if(mp_Frame) delete mp_Frame;
00498 }
